actuals.translation[0].definitions[0].de: numbers that relate to something that has actually happened, rather than what was expected to happen
actuals.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Mobile phone operators had expected monthly usage of up to 250 minutes. Actuals are very different, at 100 minutes.
